tatami.simulation

Class BootSettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xqhs.util.config.Config
      • tatami.simulation.BootSettingsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable

    public class BootSettingsManager
extends net.xqhs.util.config.Config
    This class manages settings for simulations. It handles loading these settings from various sources -- BootDefaultArguments, arguments given to the main() method in Boot, or settings specified in the scenario file.

    The precedence of values for settings is the following (latter values override former values):

    • values given in BootDefaultArguments;
    • values given as arguments to method main() in Boot;
    • values given in the scenario file.
    Each setting may come from values only in some of the above state sources. The specific cases are mentioned in the documentation of each setting.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

      • load

        public net.xqhs.util.XML.XMLTree load(java.lang.String[] programArguments,
                             boolean parseScenarioFile)
                               throws net.xqhs.util.config.Config.ConfigLockedException
        The method loads all available values from the specified sources.

        The only given source is the arguments the program has received, as the name of the scneario file will be decided by this method. If it is instructed through the parameter, the scenario file is parsed, producing an additional source of setting values.

        The load() method can be called only once. It is why all sources must be given in a single call to load().

        Therefore, if it is desired to pick any settings from the scenario file, the boolean argument should be set to true.

        Parameters:
        programArguments - - the arguments passed to the application, exactly as they were passed.
        parseScenarioFile - - if true, the scenario file will be parsed to obtain the setting values placed in the scenario; also, the XMLTree instance resulting from the parsing will be returned.
        Returns:
        if the parseScenarioFile argument was true and the parsing was successful, the resulting XML tree is returned; null otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConfigLockedException - - if load is called more than once.
        net.xqhs.util.config.Config.ConfigLockedException
